title: Loot is empty
body: I had 8 chests, some skins, essence and a gem stone all gone...

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and I see you have a decent amount of Hextech Loot. Can you restart your client or swap over to the Legacy Client (from Login) so you can see if this persists on both clients?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know what you find!
